job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionImportant Note: During the application process, ensure your contact information (email and phone number) is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration. To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation. The invitation can be sent by both email and text message. In order to receive text message invitations, your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as “Personal Cell” or “Cellular” in the contact information of your application.At Wells Fargo, we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity, equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspired.Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you.Technology sets IT strategy; enhances the design, development, and operations of our systems; optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure; provides information security; and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day, 7 days a week banking access through in-branch, online, ATMs, and other channels.Our mission is to deliver stable, secure, scalable, and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employees.Within the Consumer & Small Business Banking Technology, there is an exciting opportunity for an experienced Java/Web Services/Micro-Service senior developer who will be involved in implementing and supporting projects and enterprise releases for middleware business services. This position is responsible for design, code, test, debug and document programs using Agile development practices and also provides expert counsel to senior technology leadership and advises and mentors others with the goal of knowledge transfer. The position will be part of the development team working in EBS Forms application. The role involves design & development of Web-services/Micro-Service which interact with multiple back end systems and client applications. Also, working directly with the Product Owner and LOB partners and other technical/business teams in the US time zone, providing guidance/technical assistance to other scrum team members, technical analysis and documentation, and also help with test automation (TDD/BDD) etc. Provides technical assistance in identifying, evaluating, and developing systems and procedures that are cost effective and meet business requirements.The Java/Web Services Developer will be responsible for, but not limited to the following: Design, develop and test SOAP/RESTful Java Micro-Service in a J2EE environment Understand overall business function and technical architecture Work with other SMEs, architects, analysts and other project team members Participate in all phases of the SDLC including documentation, code reviews, research and production support Lead and direct junior team membersRequired Qualifications5+ years of software engineering experience5 + years of J2EE experience5+ years of Java experience5+ years of RESTful or SOAP web services7+ years of development and implementation experience with applications, databases, or a combination of both3+ years of microservices development experience2+ years of experience in Adobe LiveCycle or AEM products2+ years of Agile experienceDesired QualificationsAn industry-standard technology certificationStrong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skillsExperience supporting or directing offshore teamsStrong analytical skills and ability to solve complex technical problemsAgile experienceExperience operating effectively in a geographically dispersed organizationA BS/BA degree or higher in science or technologySQL experienceOther Desired Qualifications Knowledge and understanding of Micro-services architecture, framework and design patterns MongoDb knowledge is a plusJob ExpectationsAbility to travel up to 10% of the timePosition Hours: Monday - Friday (as early as 7 am and as late as 6 pm ).Flexibility to work in a 24/7 environment, including weekends and holidaysFlexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a dayStreet AddressNC-Charlotte: 1525 W Wt Harris Blvd - Charlotte, NCDisclaimerAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check.
